long_description: The INNO Aero Light 2-Bike Hitch rack features a foot-pedal release mechanism that lets you tilt forward your fully-loaded rack for quick and easy access to a rear door or your truck bed. Soft-touch rubber cradles and straps securely hold bikes to the rack; anti-sway cradles keep bikes still when in transit. Lightweight aluminum design is easy to lift and install; fits 1.25 in. and 2 in. receivers; arms fold down when not in use. Features a cable locking system to secure bikes to the rack; includes keys. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes; carrying bikes with step-through frames requires the purchase of an adapter (sold separately).
short_description: The INNO Aero Light 2-Bike Hitch rack features a foot-pedal release mechanism that lets you tilt forward your fully-loaded rack for quick and easy access to a rear door or your truck bed.
